sentence.text: While the SCN2A variant is likely to be causal for episodic ataxia, each variant may potentially contribute to the phenomuscle organ developments observed in this family.
The trio was studied by whole-exome sequencing to identify candidate genes responsible for causing the complex EA/seizure phenomuscle organ development.

Here we present a case of a proband with a complex episodic ataxias (EA)/seizure phenomuscle organ development with an EA-affected father; and an unaffected mother, all negative for CACNA1A gene mutations.
